html:
Gameplay

The Monkey Prince is not your typical online slot game. It's a 5-reel, 60-payline game with a medium volatility, which means that you can expect some decent payouts without breaking the bank. Speaking of payouts, the game has a high return to players percentage of over 95%, which is a great feature for players.

But what sets The Monkey Prince apart from other slot games is its unique mask collection mechanics. As you play the game, you'll collect masks and unlock special wild symbol features. It's a refreshing change from the usual approach, and it adds some excitement to the game. You'll feel like you're on a quest to unlock new features and abilities as you continue to play.

One of the other standout features of The Monkey Prince is the free spins bonus round. During this round, you get to choose which of the wild features will be in play throughout. It's like you're in the driver's seat and can customize your gaming experience to your liking. Who doesn't love a little bit of control?

All in all, The Monkey Prince is a fun and engaging slot game that offers a unique experience to players. If you're tired of the same old slot games, give this one a try and see why it's quickly becoming a fan favorite.

Graphics and Design

If you're looking for a slot game with visuals that will make you go bananas, look no further than The Monkey Prince! This game has outstanding graphics and design that will leave you feeling like you're in the heart of China. As soon as you spin the reels, the Monkey Prince character comes to life, doing an energetic dance to the sound of traditional Chinese music that'll have you tapping your feet in no time.

The symbols in this game are beautifully designed, borrowing heavily from Asian culture, including items like golden lions, dragons, and jewelry. It's like a virtual trip to the Far East. And the best part? The Monkey Prince is optimized for desktop computers, iPhones, iPads, Android, and Windows devices, so you can play your favorite slot game whenever and wherever you want.

Don't settle for subpar graphics and lackluster design in other slot games. The Monkey Prince is a visual feast for the eyes that will have you grinning from ear to ear. It's almost like the designers went bananas in the best possible way.

Bonus Features

If you're looking for a slot game with more bonus features than you can shake a banana at, look no further than The Monkey Prince. This game has everything a slot enthusiast could want, from free spins to wild mask features and everything in between.

One of the most unique bonus features in The Monkey Prince is the mask collection feature. As players spin the reels, they'll see blue, red, and gold ceremonial masks appear. Collecting these masks will add to a mask collection meter, and once five of a kind have been collected, special wild symbol features are triggered. It's like a scavenger hunt, with wild symbols as your prize.

During the free spins bonus round, players get to choose one of the wild mask features that will be in play for each bonus spin. With so many different combinations to choose from, you'll always be on your toes trying to figure out the best strategy for maximizing your profits. It's like having your own personal monkey advisor, without any of the banana breath.

Mobile Optimization

Let's face it, we live in a world on-the-go. Whether we're waiting for the bus, standing in line at the grocery store, or just lounging at home, we want our entertainment to be easily accessible. That's why The Monkey Prince slot game is the perfect addition to your mobile gaming library. It's fully optimized for desktops, iPhones, iPads, Androids, and Windows devices, so you can play anytime, anywhere!

But beware - don't let the game's intricate design fool you. While it may look stunning on your computer screen, some of the details may be hard to see on the smaller screen of your smartphone. So, take a break from scrolling through social media and give The Monkey Prince a spin on your tablet or laptop - your eyes will thank you!

Experience The Asian-Inspired Delight Of The Monkey Prince

The Monkey Prince is not your average online slot game. This game takes you on a journey through the rich and vibrant culture of Asia. With every spin, you’ll be transported to a world of golden lions, dragons, jewelry, and more. The game’s immersive graphics and sound effects make it a truly captivating experience.

But what makes The Monkey Prince stand out from other online slot games is the inspiration behind it. The game is loosely based on the Chinese novel, Journey to the West, which tells the tale of the Monkey King. It’s a beloved story in Chinese culture and is just one of the many reasons why The Monkey Prince is such a hit with players around the globe.

You’ll feel like you’re part of the story as you spin the reels and watch as The Monkey Prince himself makes appearances on the screen. The game’s unique Bonus Feature adds to the excitement as you try to land on the right symbols to unlock even more chances to win.

If you’re looking for a truly immersive gaming experience that transports you to another world, The Monkey Prince is the perfect online slot game for you. With its captivating graphics, exciting Bonus Feature, and references to Chinese mythology, it’s no wonder why players keep coming back for more.

Betting Options

Ready to spin the reels and go bananas with The Monkey Prince online slot game? All 60 paylines are active and the minimum bet to get started is just 0.60. But if you're feeling like a high roller, you can swing all the way up to the maximum bet limit of 1,800 per spin. That's a lot of bananas to wager!

Our review team couldn't believe how easy it was to control the bet options. Even for those who have never played an online slot game before, it's simple to set the desired bet amount and get spinning. You might say it's as easy as peeling a banana! Just remember, when it comes to betting options, always gamble responsibly. You don't want to end up with a bunch of regrets.

Certification for Fair Play

Did you know that The Monkey Prince, one of the newest games from IGT, is fully certified for fair play? That means you can enjoy all your favorite slot features with complete confidence in the safety, security, and fairness of the game.

But what happens if the monkey prince isn't feeling so fair on any given day? We can just imagine him sitting up in his jungle throne, pulling levers and turning gears with his mischievous little paws. Maybe he's feeling a bit naughty and decides to mess with your spins – but never fear, because IGT has got you covered.

With their certification for fair play, you can be sure that The Monkey Prince – and all IGT games – are carefully monitored to ensure that every spin is completely random and unbiased. Whether you're playing for fun or trying to hit it big, you can trust that your odds of winning are as good as anyone else's.

Availability at Real Money Sites

Ah, the sweet sound of winning money! Fortunately, you can enjoy The Monkey Prince at a great selection of recommended real money sites that carry games and software from the IGT developer. It's like finding a banana full of cash in the jungle!

IGT is a well-known and respected name in the industry, ensuring that players have access to reputable and trustworthy platforms to play The Monkey Prince and other games. You don't want to find yourself in the shady part of town, playing slot games with the local monkeys, do you? Stick to the known and trusted sites and you'll be swinging from tree to tree in no time!

[faq group="The Monkey Prince" open="true" title="FAQ"]

What we like

  • Unique mask collection feature that unlocks special wild symbol features.
  • Outstanding graphics and design inspired by Asian culture.
  • Several unique bonus features, including a free spins bonus round.
  • Certified for fair play and available at trusted real money sites.

What we don't like

  • Some of the game's intricacies may be hard to see on a smartphone screen.
  • Limited betting options compared to some other slot games.
meta_title: Play The Monkey Prince Slot Game for Free - Review
meta_desc: The Monkey Prince slot game - a unique Asian-inspired game with free spins and a mask collection feature. Play for free!
